summary: The Soo Locks Security and Economic Reporting Act of 2025 mandates a report to Congress within one year of enactment. This report, compiled by the Secretary of Transportation in conjunction with the Commandant of the Coast Guard and Secretary of Defense, will assess the security vulnerabilities of the Soo Locks in Michigan, detail potential supply chain and economic impacts of a malfunction or failure, identify threats, describe current security measures, and provide recommendations with cost estimates for strengthening security and mitigating supply chain disruptions.
